mapper.select: SELECT user_id, id, product_no, order_product_no, order_product_count, order_product_price, order_product_name, order_date, order_product_url FROM order_product ORDER BY order_product_no

SELECT user_id, id, product_no, order_product_no, order_product_count, order_product_price, order_product_name, order_date, order_product_url, (select name from user where order_product.user_id = user.user_id) AS name, (select address from user where order_product.user_id = user.user_id) AS address, (select zip_code from user where order_product.user_id = user.user_id) AS zip_code, (select address_detail from user where order_product.user_id = user.user_id) AS address_detail, (select phone from user where order_product.user_id = user.user_id) AS phone FROM order_product WHERE product_no = #{product_no} ORDER BY order_date desc
